short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch between A/B experiment variants for Convert, VWO & Varify.io

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "A/B Experiment Variant Switcher" is a Chrome extension that allows users to switch between variants in A/B tests conducted with tools like Convert, VWO & Varify.io® . It's intended for CRO consultants, web developers, online marketers, and UX designers involved in website testing and optimization. To use it, simply click the extension icon while on a page running an A/B test, and select the variant you wish to view. This tool requires minimal permissions, ensuring user privacy and data security.

V0.6
Added support for Varify.io® 
Badge added with the number of experiments running on the page
Added functionality to flush/remove experiments, to clear the cookies
